name: Minimal Theme
print_styles: @media print { * { box-shadow: none !important; text-shadow: none !important; } body { background: white !important; color: black !important; font-size: 10pt; } .container { max-width: none !important; margin: 0 !important; padding: 0.5cm !important; } .card { page-break-inside: avoid; margin-bottom: 0.5cm; border-bottom: 2px solid #000 !important; } .text-blue-700, .text-purple-700, .text-blue-600, .text-purple-600 { color: #333 !important; } table { border-collapse: collapse !important; } td, th { border: 1px solid #000 !important; } }
